data.message: hi facebook! please help us. my mom's fb is disabled or blocked. her fb name is "figlia unica" which means only child. it's obviously different from her real name but the account were not intented for any violence. i couldnt see anything wrong with that name besides. there are a lot of posers and second accounts out therez i wonder why my mom's account has been chosen. this account is her one and only account. she's flying from italia back to the philippines about a week from now and her account is really really important. please dont ignore me. we need your help.

replies.message: Hey Joey. We hear your frustration. If you think she may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2u5cePS. -Ashley

greetings Facebook ! if it was blocked by mostake or not, i just want to retrieve it. i think you did not read my whole post. her account's name is figlia unica which is obviously not her real name. how would that be? thanks!

Joey Francisco
Hello Can I talk to you on your own
